subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Stevan Ridley, who tore the anterior cruciate and medial collateral ligaments in his right knee in his final year before free agency, got a one-year contract from the Jets worth $1.25 million.
snippet: Stevan Ridley, who tore the anterior cruciate and medial collateral ligaments in his right knee in his final year before free agency, got a one-year contract from the Jets worth $1.25 million.
